            <string language="hu">Elbocsátott végvári vitézek</string>
            <string language="en">Dismissed knights of border fortress</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Entlassene Ritter der Randfestung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Chevaliers écartés de forteresse de cadre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Knights demitidos do fortress da beira</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Cavalieri allontanati del fortress del bordo</string>

frontera</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Elbocsátott végvári vitézek bemutatása</string>
            <string language="en">Presentation of dismissed knights of border fortress</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">felkelés,  támadások,  végvári vitézek,  lovas hadtest,  lovasság,  ló,  </string>

          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Darstellung der entlassenen Ritter der

          </description>

forteresse de cadre</string>
          </description>
          <description>

beira</string>
          </description>
          <description>

          </description>
          <description>

συνόρων</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Presentación de caballeros despedidos de la 
fortaleza de la frontera</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Aufstand, Angriffe, Ritter der Randfestung,

          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">rébellion, attaques, chevaliers de forteresse de cadre,

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">ribellione, attacchi, cavalieri del fortress del 
bordo, corpo del cavalry, cavalry, cavallo</string>

          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εξέγερση, επιθέσεις, ιππότες του φρουρίου συνόρων, ιππικό

          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">rebelión, ataques, caballeros de la fortaleza de la
